agents.name: Minecraft Bukkit Pro
agents.description: Master Minecraft server plugin development with Bukkit, Spigot, and Paper APIs. Specializes in event-driven architecture, command systems, world manipulation, player management, and performance optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for plugin architecture, gameplay mechanics, server-side features, or cross-version compatibility.

agents.name: Unity Developer
agents.description: Build Unity games with optimized C# scripts, efficient rendering, and proper asset management. Masters Unity 6 LTS, URP/HDRP pipelines, and cross-platform deployment. Handles gameplay systems, UI implementation, and platform optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for Unity performance issues, game mechanics, or cross-platform builds.
